channel.title: How do i fix casting spells
channel.description: Hello, im using the source thats by wolf. im not sure the exact name, all i know is that its by wolf. But, when people go to cast spells, they dont need runes for them...how do i make it so that for example to cast wind strike you need 1 air and 1 mind or to cast fire wave you need 3 airs and 1 blood? thanks in advance

item.title: How do i fix casting spells
item.dc:creator: @qhx398 qhx398
item.description:
@qhx398 wrote:

where do i inster that in the client? i tried after the spell but when i went to compile, it came up with errors

Read full topic

item.title: How do i fix casting spells
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

You would add this to the spell for wind striek and change the runes for other spells…

if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true)) {

Read full topic
